title: Customer Feedback Widget
problems: Customer feedback scattered across 5 channels (email, chat, phone, social, surveys)
Support team spends 5 hours/week manually categorizing feedback
Product team lacks visibility into customer pain points
NPS score stagnant at 42 for 6 months
context: B2B SaaS company with 500 customers, 10-person support team, quarterly product releases. Current tools: Zendesk, Intercom, SurveyMonkey. No centralized feedback system.

title: Mobile App Offline Mode
problems: Users lose access to itineraries when traveling without connectivity
30% of support tickets related to 'app not working' during flights/remote areas
Competitor apps offer offline functionality
App Store rating dropped from 4.5 to 3.8 due to offline complaints
context: Travel booking mobile app with 2M active users. 40% of users travel internationally. Average trip duration: 7 days. Key features: itineraries, maps, bookings, recommendations.

title: Multi-Region API Gateway
problems: Single-region API causes 200-500ms latency for international customers
Downtime in US-East-1 affects all customers globally
SLA violations cost $50K/month in credits
Enterprise customers require 99.99% uptime guarantee
context: API platform serving 10K developers, 100M requests/day. Current: Single AWS region (US-East-1). Target markets: North America, Europe, Asia-Pacific. Revenue: $20M ARR, 60% from enterprise.

title: Employee Onboarding Automation
problems: HR manually creates 47-item checklist for each new hire
IT provisioning takes 3-5 days (should be same-day)
New hires wait 2 weeks for full system access
Onboarding inconsistency across departments
context: Company hiring 20 employees/month. Current process: Manual spreadsheets, email chains, Slack reminders. Systems to integrate: Okta, Google Workspace, GitHub, Slack, HR system (BambooHR).

title: Multi-Channel Inventory Sync
problems: Overselling causes 50 cancellations/week ($25K lost revenue)
Manual inventory updates across 4 channels take 2 hours/day
Stock discrepancies lead to customer complaints (15% of support tickets)
Unable to expand to new sales channels due to sync limitations
context: E-commerce retailer selling on: Website, Amazon, eBay, Walmart Marketplace. 5K SKUs, 200 orders/day. Current: Manual CSV uploads twice daily. Target: Real-time sync across all channels.

title: Patient Portal with HIPAA Compliance
problems: Patients call clinic 500 times/week for test results (30 min average hold time)
Staff spend 20 hours/week answering 'when will results be ready' questions
HIPAA violations risk due to results sent via unencrypted email
Patient satisfaction score: 2.8/5 (industry average: 4.1/5)
context: Medical clinic with 15K patients, 50 staff. Current: Paper-based results, phone calls, fax. Systems: Epic EHR, lab integration (LabCorp, Quest). Regulatory: HIPAA, state privacy laws.

title: Real-Time Fraud Detection System
problems: Fraud losses: $2M/year (0.5% of transaction volume)
Manual review team can only check 10% of flagged transactions
False positive rate: 15% (blocks legitimate customers)
Detection lag: 24-48 hours (fraud already completed)
context: Payment processor handling $400M/year, 50K transactions/day. Current: Rule-based system with manual review. Target: Real-time detection with <5% false positive rate, <1 second decision time.

title: Monolith to Microservices Migration
problems: Deployments require 4-hour maintenance window (monthly, off-hours only)
Single bug can take down entire platform (happened 3 times in Q4)
Teams blocked waiting for other teams' changes to deploy
Scaling entire monolith costs $50K/month (only need to scale 2 services)
context: Enterprise SaaS platform, 200K users, 50 engineers across 8 teams. Current: Ruby on Rails monolith (500K LOC), PostgreSQL, Redis. Target: Enable independent team deployments, reduce infrastructure costs 40%.
